Demographics

You can configure the Demographics window with the Demographics Editor in Customize. To use the Demographics Editor, you must belong to a user group with the system right PIF Configure. Once created, a configuration can be used in other templates by exporting and importing it.

 

Before configuring the Demographics window, it is helpful to plan the window content; consider the information you want to display and how you want to see it. Reducing extra text allows more room for data. This is especially true in sections that have subheadings.
